trans-unit.source: Provides access to an ordered, strongly typed collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 对象的有序强类型集合的访问。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 标识要添加到集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> element to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 中添加一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.Add%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.Add%2A>方法将添加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>。

trans-unit.source: To view the complete sample, see [How to: Manipulate Columns and Rows by Using ColumnDefinitionsCollections and RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看完整的示例，请参阅[如何： 操作列和行通过使用 ColumnDefinitionsCollections 和 RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md)。

trans-unit.source: Clears the content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 清除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.Clear%2A> method to clear the content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.Clear%2A>方法以清除的内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>。

trans-unit.source: To view the complete sample, see [How to: Manipulate Columns and Rows by Using ColumnDefinitionsCollections and RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看完整的示例，请参阅[如何： 操作列和行通过使用 ColumnDefinitionsCollections 和 RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> that is being tested.
trans-unit.target: 标识要测试的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> exists within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 中是否存在给定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> exists within the collection; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合中存在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> exists in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.Contains%2A>方法来确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>中存在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>。

trans-unit.source: To view the complete sample, see [How to: Manipulate Columns and Rows by Using ColumnDefinitionsCollections and RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看完整的示例，请参阅[如何： 操作列和行通过使用 ColumnDefinitionsCollections 和 RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md)。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the index position within <c>array</c> to which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> objects are copied.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <c>array</c> 中要将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 对象复制到的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies an array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> objects to a given index position within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 对象的数组复制到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 中的给定索引位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> uses a zero-based indexing system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 使用从零开始的索引系统。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the source <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: 源 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 中的元素数大于从索引到目标数组末尾处的可用空间。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of items within this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 实例中的项总数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的项总数。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> uses a zero-based indexing system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 使用从零开始的索引系统。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.Count%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To view the complete sample, see [How to: Manipulate Columns and Rows by Using ColumnDefinitionsCollections and RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看完整的示例，请参阅[如何： 操作列和行通过使用 ColumnDefinitionsCollections 和 RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> whose index position is desired.
trans-unit.target: 需要其索引位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index position of a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 中的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The index of <paramref name="value" /> if found in the collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在集合中找到该对象，则为 <paramref name="value" />；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> within a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法来确定的索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>内<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>。

trans-unit.source: To view the complete sample, see [How to: Manipulate Columns and Rows by Using ColumnDefinitionsCollections and RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看完整的示例，请参阅[如何： 操作列和行通过使用 ColumnDefinitionsCollections 和 RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md)。

trans-unit.source: The position within the collection where the item is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 集合中用来插入项的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> at the specified index position within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 插入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 中的指定索引位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> uses a zero-based indexing system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 使用从零开始的索引系统。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.Insert%2A> method to insert a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> to a specific `index` position within a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.Insert%2A>方法插入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>到特定`index`内定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>。

trans-unit.source: To view the complete sample, see [How to: Manipulate Columns and Rows by Using ColumnDefinitionsCollections and RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看完整的示例，请参阅[如何： 操作列和行通过使用 ColumnDefinitionsCollections 和 RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 中的有效索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 是否为只读。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection is read-only; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该集合为只读，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何获取的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To view the complete sample, see [How to: Manipulate Columns and Rows by Using ColumnDefinitionsCollections and RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看完整的示例，请参阅[如何： 操作列和行通过使用 ColumnDefinitionsCollections 和 RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether access to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 的访问。（即访问是否是线程安全的。）

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to this collection is synchronized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果同步对此集合的访问，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions that result from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: The current item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的当前项。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the current item within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，它指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 中的当前项。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> uses a zero-based indexing system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 使用从零开始的索引系统。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 不是集合中的有效索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从该集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 中移除一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> was found in the collection and removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在集合中找到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 并将其移除，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The position within the collection at which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> is removed.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 的位置。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 中移除指定索引位置处的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> uses a zero-based indexing system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 使用从零开始的索引系统。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> at a specific `index` position.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法移除<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>位于特定`index`位置。

trans-unit.source: To view the complete sample, see [How to: Manipulate Columns and Rows by Using ColumnDefinitionsCollections and RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看完整的示例，请参阅[如何： 操作列和行通过使用 ColumnDefinitionsCollections 和 RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md)。

trans-unit.source: The position within the collection at which the first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> is removed.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 的位置。

trans-unit.source: The total number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> objects to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 对象的总数。

trans-unit.source: Removes a range of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> objects from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition" /> 中移除一定范围的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> uses a zero-based indexing system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 使用从零开始的索引系统。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.RemoveRange%2A> method to remove a range of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection.RemoveRange%2A>方法移除一系列<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>元素从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>。

trans-unit.source: To view the complete sample, see [How to: Manipulate Columns and Rows by Using ColumnDefinitionsCollections and RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看完整的示例，请参阅[如何： 操作列和行通过使用 ColumnDefinitionsCollections 和 RowDefinitionsCollections](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/manipulate-columns-and-rows-by-using-columndefinitionscollections.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions that result from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个循环访问集合的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于循环访问集合的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the copied items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个从零开始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它接收 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 的复制项。

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中接收复制内容的第一个位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to an <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at a particular <see cref="T:System.Array" /> index.
trans-unit.target: 将该集合的元素复制到 <see cref="T:System.Array" />（从特定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 索引开始）。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个循环访问集合的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于循环访问集合的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 向集合中添加一项。

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: 新元素的插入位置。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 中定位的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the collection contains a specific value.
trans-unit.target: 确定集合中是否包含特定值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 中找到了 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 中定位的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specific item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定集合中特定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of <paramref name="value" /> if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在列表中找到，则为 <paramref name="value" /> 的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，在该处插入 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要插入到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item to the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将一个项插入到集合中指定的索引处。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示集合是否具有固定大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" /> has a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 具有固定大小，则为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置的元素的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index position in the list.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 不是列表中的有效索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要从 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除特定对象的第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。
